authors.author: Franz Gruber John Freeman Young Joseph Mohr

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Silent night, holy night, newline All is calm, all is bright. newline Round yon virgin mother and child; newline Holy infant, so tender and mild, newline Sleep in heavenly peace; newline Sleep in heavenly peace.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Silent night, holy night, newline Shepherds quake at the sight. newline Glories stream from heaven afar, newline Heavenly hosts sing "Alleluia. newline Christ the Savior is born; newline Christ the Savior is born."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Silent night, holy night, newline Son of God, love's pure light. newline Radiant beams from Thy holy face, newline With the dawn of redeeming grace. newline Jesus, Lord, at Thy birth; newline Jesus, Lord, at Thy birth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Silent night, holy night, newline Wondrous star, lend thy light. newline With the angels, let us sing, newline Alleluia to our King. newline Christ the Savior is born; newline Christ the Savior is born.
